applicant-name.name: JIANGSU TOUTE NEW ENERGY CO LTD
JIANGSU YANCHANG SUNLAITE NEWS ENERGY CO LTD
KUNSHAN INNOVATION INSTITUTE OF NANJING UNIV
江苏投特新能源有限公司,
江苏延长桑莱特新能源有限公司,
南京大学昆山创新研究院

invention-title: Method for preparing medium-entropy or high-entropy multi-metal hydride material through laser ablation
一种激光烧蚀制备中熵或高熵多金属氢化物材料的方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to the technical field of hydrogen and energy storage material preparation, in particular to a method for preparing a medium-entropy or high-entropy multi-metal hydride material through laser ablation. The method comprises the following steps: S1, grinding precursors of all elements (not including hydrogen) in a fitted medium-entropy or high-entropy multi-metal hydride material according to an equal molar ratio or a nearly equal molar ratio; s2, uniformly dispersing the precursor powder ground in the step S1 at the bottom of the solution in a glass container with or without a substrate; and S3, introducing nitrogen into the glass container in the S2 to maintain the inert gas atmosphere, and carrying out laser ablation treatment on the precursor powder in the solution in the glass container. By means of the method, the problems that high pressure is needed for directly synthesizing the low-hydrogen high-entropy or medium-entropy multi-metal hydride from the high-entropy alloy, and hydrogen is not prone to entering the high-entropy or medium-entropy alloy due to the lattice hysteresis effect can be effectively solved.

本发明涉及储氢储能材料制备技术领域，具体发明了一种激光烧蚀制备中熵或高熵多金属氢化物材料的方法。该方法包括以下步骤：S1：将拟合成中熵或高熵多金属氢化物材料中各元素(不包括氢)的前驱体以等摩尔比或近等摩尔比进行研磨；S2：将S1中研磨好的前驱体粉末均匀分散在有基底或无基底的玻璃容器里的溶液底部；S3：向S2中玻璃容器内通入氮气以维持惰性气体气氛，对置于玻璃容器溶液内的前驱体粉末进行激光烧蚀处理。该方法能够有效解决由高熵合金直接合成低氢高熵或中熵多金属氢化物需要较高的压力、以及由于晶格迟滞效应导致氢不容易进入高熵或中熵合金的问题。
